mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.exampaper_id as exampaperId ,a.examquestion_name as examquestionName ,a.examquestion_options as examquestionOptions ,a.examquestion_score as examquestionScore ,a.examquestion_answer as examquestionAnswer ,a.examquestion_analysis as examquestionAnalysis ,a.examquestion_types as examquestionTypes ,a.examquestion_sequence as examquestionSequence ,a.create_time as createTime
